about_the_game:
"Dash and fire" is an animation style 3D super action game. The game adopts the hand-painted super fire animation style, and is famous for its shocking and refreshing sense of attack. Its innovative real-time combat PK system, precise attack judgment, and pure fighting game settings such as hard straight, floating, combo, and body are designed to bring top-level action game experience to players. In addition, as the level increases, a variety of new functions or activities will also be unlocked. For example, blade soul, talent card, artifact, fashion, legion, consignment, endless nightmare and other classic play methods.

about the game screen


"Dash and fire" game screen focuses on the style of hot-blooded animation. The game screen uses a lot of gorgeous colors, and the skills are very eye-catching. Even the general attack can also make the players enjoy themselves. In the single challenge with the boss, all kinds of skill moves and collisions, the sense of visual impact is super strong, and it feels that the whole screen will be cracked. If you three people team up to pick the boss, the skill moves of each player will be released in a series, which can instantly light up your eyes.

about occupation


"Dash and fire" has opened up three classes, soul chopping and high damage melee class. It is recommended for novices to choose. Shadow blade, assassin occupation, recommend a certain micro operation technology players. Ghost hand, magic type long-distance occupation, novice can also experience, master will also have more room to play. Every profession has its own advantages and has a good sense of attack.

about operations


"Dash and fire" uses virtual rocker + virtual key operation. At the same time, you can also choose the operation mode of automatic fighting, or even manual + automatic combination. It is faster to use automatic combat clearance in the early stage, and easier to use automatic + manual clearance in the middle stage. But the real operation of the emperor is to pass the experience out.

about upgrading


how to upgrade quickly? Please pay attention to the "task" in the upper right corner of the interface. It is several times more than other ways to get experience to do daily tasks

about equipment


if you want to improve combat effectiveness, how can you get good equipment

1. You must participate in the level unlocking activities and arena, and you can exchange the shell coins for the equipment in the store

2. Many pieces of advanced equipment will be piled up in the process of the game. If you click it in the backpack interface, you can enter the falling level. After a certain quantity is collected, the equipment will be automatically generated.

Its innovative real-time combat PK system, precise attack judgment, and pure fighting game settings such as hard straight, floating, combo, and body are designed to bring top-level action game experience to players. if you want to improve combat effectiveness, how can you get good equipment

1. You must participate in the level unlocking activities and arena, and you can exchange the shell coins for the equipment in the store

2. Many pieces of advanced equipment will be piled up in the process of the game. If you click it in the backpack interface, you can enter the falling level. After a certain quantity is collected, the equipment will be automatically generated.

name: Dash and Fire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4130 @ 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: mx150 2G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: "Dash and fire" uses hand-painted super fire animation style, and is famous for its shocking and refreshing sense of attack. Precise attack judgment, hard straight, floating, combo, body and other pure fighting game settings are designed to bring players the top-level action game experience.
